thread.section_title: Caravel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect type of Hotel
thread.title_full: Perfect type of Hotel - Review of Caravel Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Louisealdred
title: Perfect type of Hotel
text:
This is the type of hotel you need to stay in when your wanting to travel around a city.
The hotel was plain, simple and clean. They provided a continental breakfast and there were friendly reception staff who couldn't do enough for you. There's a cute coffee shop next door who does lovely sandwiches and an amazing pizza place a few doors down. The hotel isn't in the centre but it's about â‚¬10 to get there. Honestly you will be out all day so I'd recommend this hotel for any future travellers!
